name: Hydrokeratin Curl Serum [150ml]
about:
Have hair like Son Ye Jin with 7 series of Self Up haircare!

Hydrokeratin Curl Serum can be used before styling your hair to nourish it, give it volume and make your styling results more perfect. This product is the fourth in the SELF UP Hair Series, which is formulated from 20 years of experience at Jennyhouse salons in Korea. This product is made from natural ingredients free of 12 harmful ingredients and specially formulated for hair loss problems, dry hair that is damaged and split ends due to coloring and styling.
detail:
Volume : 150ML
Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
Hydrolyzed Keratin: Provides nutrition to the scalp.
Biomimetic Ceramide: Provides nutrition to hair.
Jeju Marine Complex : Moisturizes hair and makes hair look strong from the outside and the inside
guide:
1. Make sure hair is clean and has been dried.
2. Apply an appropriate amount of product to hair evenly
3. After that, do the styling you want.

name: Hydrokeratin Essence Mist [95ml]
about:
Have hair like Son Ye Jin with 7 series of Self Up haircare!

Hydrokertatin Essence mist functions to nourish hair, provide a protective layer and give hair a smooth texture. This product is the fifth in the SELF UP Hair Series, which was formulated from 20 years of experience at Jennyhouse salons in Korea. This product is made from natural ingredients free of 12 harmful ingredients and is specially formulated for hair loss problems, dry hair that is damaged by coloring and styling.
detail:
Volume : 95ML
Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
Hydrolyzed Keratin: Provides nutrition to the scalp.
Biomimetic Ceramide: Provides nutrition to the hair.
Jeju Marine Complex : Moisturizes hair and makes hair look strong from the outside and the inside
guide:
1. Make sure the hair is clean and dry.
2. Spray enough product and trim your hair by hand until you get the desired hair shape.
3. Leave it for a few seconds until the hair is completely dry.

name: Hydrokeratin Leave-in Angeling Cream [150ml]
about:
Have hair like Son Ye Jin with 7 series of Self Up haircare!

Hydrokeratin Leave-in Angel Ring Cream is a treatment cream that is applied without needing to be rinsed again. This product serves to nourish and improve the texture of the hair to make it healthier and softer. This product is the third series of SELF UP Hair Series which is formulated from 20 years experience of Jennyhouse salon in Korea. This product is made from natural ingredients free of 12 harmful ingredients and specially formulated for hair loss problems, dry hair that is damaged and split ends due to coloring and styling.
detail:

Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
Hydrolyzed Keratin: Provides nutrition to the scalp.
Biomimetic Ceramide: Provides nutrition to the hair.
Jeju Marine Complex : Moisturizes hair and makes hair look strong from the outside and the inside
guide:
1. Make sure your hair is clean and moist, then apply an appropriate amount of product to your hair evenly

name: Rebak Style Repair Shampoo [400ml]
about: Rebak Style Repair Shampoo is a shampoo that works to reduce the symptoms of hair loss by containing 98% natural ingredients and a good formula that makes the scalp and weak hair healthy. Contains Protein and Amino Acids which function to moisturize and care for each strand so that your hair is healthy and shiny.
detail:
Volume : 400 ML
Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
1.Aloe Vera Leaf Water: Increases hair strength and nutrition
2. Jeju Tangerine Peal Extract: To prevent hair damage
3. Jeju Green Tea Extract: Moisturizes and straightens hair
4. Jeju Joritdea Extract: Protects the scalp and strengthens hair
5. Jeju Lotus Leaf Extract: Strengthens hair defense
6. Asparagus Stem Extract: Strengthens hair resistance
7. Broccoli Extract: Prevents scalp aging
8. Avocado Oil: Increases scalp moisture
guide:
1. Apply 1-2 pumps to wet hair evenly.
2. Massage the hair that has been applied.
3. Leave it for 2-3 minutes, then the hair can be rinsed immediately

name: Jewel Fit Blush Blooming Shine [10g]
about: Blusher that has a vegan formula that can give a bright and natural effect. This blusher has a soft texture and is easy to apply.
detail:
Volume : 10 ML
Dimension : 2 x 3 x 15 cm
Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
Gelatin Oil: To nourish the skin and brighten
Corn Extract Glycerin: Moisturizes and softens the skin
Multi-size Pearl: Gives a glitter and bright effect
Special Silicone Powder: To make product application softer and more durable
guide:
1. Set the Jewel Fit Blusher Blooming Shine applicator, press the tube gently.
2. Apply Jewel Fit Blusher Blooming Shine with puff, finger or brush to desired area.

name: Jewel Fit Highlighter Glow Shine [10g]
about: Jewel Fit Highlighter Glossy Shine is formulated with vegan ingredients that can give your face a natural glow effect on areas you want to highlight. This highlighter has a light and soft texture and is easy to apply.
detail:
Volume : 10 ml
Dimension : 2 x 3 x 15 cm
Made in : South Korea

Ingredients :
Olive Oil Extract : To prevent product application from clumping and dampness.
Snail Extract : Moisturizes and maintains skin elasticity.
Porcelin Flower Extract : Contains antioxidants to brighten the skin.
guide:
1. Open the product lid, rotate the Jewel Fit Highlighter Glossy Shine applicator head.
2. Press the tube slowly and apply it to the desired area of the face
2. Flatten the product with a puff, finger or brush until it matches the desired result.

Made in : South Korea

name: World Volume Coating Tint
about:
World Volume Coating Tint is a Lip tint that can last up to 24 full hours and is waterproof and transferproof. Formulated from vegan ingredients and has a light texture and can give your lips a volumizing effect.

Variants :
#01 HAWAIAN PEACH - NA26211300149
#02 SHANGHAI SUNSET RED - NA26211300189
#03 INDIAFALLIN PINK - NA26211300190
#04 FRANJINI PLUM - NA26211300150
#05 SEOUL GLAM STAR - NA26211300115
guide:
1. Apply World Volume Coating Tint to the desired lip area.
2. Blend the color using a product brush or use your finger
3. Wait 30-60 seconds until it dries and the color will last all day

name: Premium Hair Color
about: Hair dye with selected color variants of Jennyhouse Salon Korea which is made with natural CICA ingredients to maintain healthy scalp and hair.
detail:
Variants :
1. 1N Black
2. 5NB Dark Brown
3. 6NB Natural Brown
4. 7RB Rose Gold Brown
5. 9CPB Coral Pink Brown
6. 11PB Pink Brown
7. 11AB Ash Brown
guide:
1. Use plastic gloves before the process begins.
2. Mix dye No. 1 & oxidizer no. 2 in a container with a 1:1 ratio as needed, then stir evenly.
3. Apply the dye mixture to the hair evenly and leave it for 35 minutes.
4. Rinse hair with water until clean and dry.

name: Self Up Hair Line Brush
about: Hairline dye to fill in gaps and cover gray hair. Can be used to reinforce the texture of the eyebrows and provide facial contour lines with a natural brown color.
guide:
1. Remove the brush attached to the bottom of the container
2. Take enough product with a brush and apply it to the desired part.
